title: Group portrait of Letsche Elementary School track champions, from left, first row: Myron Little, Walter Cabbagestalk, and James Strong; second row: Jerome Turner, James Colvin, Leroy Grant, and Robert Taylor; third row: Harry Dowdy, Thomas Thrift, and Walter Harris; fourth row: James Lindsay, Louis Morgan, Ernest Whitted, and Cleveland Edwards; fifth row: Ellis Montague, Dwight Hill, Reams Colby, Louis Jones, and R.T. Crystian; sixth row: Andrew Boyd, Leslie Cox, Sam Fleming and Coach J. Donald Geyer, standing on steps below school
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
